mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_SEQ, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, ENABLE FROM skysearch.ss_member ORDER BY NAME ASC;

select group_concat(local.LOCAL_SEQ) as LOCAL_SEQ FROM skysearch.ss_member member left JOIN skysearch.ss_int_local int_local ON member.MEMBER_SEQ = int_local.MEMBER_SEQ left JOIN skysearch.ss_local local ON int_local.local_SEQ = local.local_SEQ where member.EMAIL=#{EMAIL}
select EMAIL, NAME, PHONE, PASSWORD from SS_MEMBER where NAME = #{name}
select EMAIL from SS_MEMBER where EMAIL=#{EMAIL} and ENABLE='Y'
mapper.update: update skysearch.ss_member set ENABLE='N' where EMAIL = #{email} and PASSWORD = #{password}
update skysearch.ss_member set ENABLE='N' where MEMBER_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ}
